getBalances(address[],address[]).notice: Check the token balances of a wallet for multiple tokens. Pass 0x0 as a "token" address to get ETH balance. Possible error throws:   - extremely large arrays for account and or tokens (gas cost too high) Returns a one-dimensional that's user.length * tokens.length long. The array is ordered by all of the 0th users token balances, then the 1th user, and so on.
